nodes.excerpt: Nearly all mobile apps encourage phone use. We do the opposite. DTCH helps you put your phone away and enjoy real life. When DTCH is activated, your phone will gently vibrate when you grab or unlock it, signaling you to put it down & detach.
nodes.title: DTCH - iOS app to encourage you to gently curb your phone usage
nodes.author: Josef Kirk Myers

nodes.excerpt: Whether you need anonymous emotional support, space to vent, or even just someone to talk to without judgment or biasâ€”your Buddyâ€™s here for you. The LonePack Buddy app gives you a platform to discuss anything at any time completely free of cost.
nodes.title: LonePack Buddy - A free mental health peer support app
nodes.author: Sharath Kuruganty

nodes.excerpt: Aura is a safe, simple online solution that helps people deal with end-of-life confidently. It allows you to record and share key information on how you'd like to go, leave important practical information to loved ones and celebrate your life story.
nodes.title: Aura Life - A platform that lets you prepare for death & celebrate life

nodes.title: BRITEN - Effective sonic powered toothbrush for teeth whitening

nodes.excerpt: Your personal shopping companion with integrated recipes, loyalty cards and shopping suggestions â€“ Get the brand new version 4.0.0 of the all-in-one shopping list app now for free! Available for iOS, Android, web, voice and smartwatch & tablet!
nodes.title: Bring! - The simplest shopping list for sharing

nodes.excerpt: One good thing is a curated repository of ideas and thoughts to keep you motivated during tough times. Feeling overwhelmed and looking for something feel-good? One good thing lets you discover an activity that can restore goodness.

nodes.title: Wozi - Your cheat code to making healthy food taste delicious

nodes.excerpt: Dash is the culmination of a passion for sports & tech. For a long time I wanted to build something using Strava's API, so throughout the years Dash took many forms. Ultimately with the release of iOS 14, I knew this was the right opportunity to release it.
nodes.title: Dash - Run and ride widget for Strava
nodes.author: Rui Peres

nodes.excerpt: x100 â€” the app that counts. x100 helps you keep track of your reps during workouts. No need to count reps in your head anymore, let us do it for you. Relax, enjoy your workout music, watch the news or listen to an audiobook while x100 does the counting.
nodes.title: x100 - App that counts
nodes.author: Anton Repponen

nodes.excerpt: Breathly is a 100% free mobile app that helps you focus on your breathing. Use Breathly for daily relaxation and breath training: just choose a breathing technique and focus on the guided exercise. Breathly is free, with no trackers and no in-app purchases.
nodes.title: Breathly - Open-source breath training and relaxation app
nodes.author: Matteo Mazzarolo

nodes.excerpt: Do you work 10+ hours without taking breaks? You're not alone. Work breaks are simple and powerful yet we skip them because they're boring â € Cuely uses behavior design, positive psychology and social support to make it fun so you can stay well and feel happier
nodes.title: Cuely - 1-min guided exercises to stay well all day with reminders

nodes.title: Therappy - Cope with stress and burnout

nodes.title: Rejoy Health - Comprehensive back and joint pain management

nodes.excerpt: Hey! We're an Australian start up that's just released BodyGuide. It's an app that helps you self solve aches, pains and tension. There's no payment details for the promo so you don't have to cancel. Fix your neck, back, shoulder, knee & hip pain - for free.
nodes.title: BodyGuide - The app that helps you self-solve aches, pain and tension

nodes.excerpt: breakthru is a curated list of 40+ self-care tools & resources. It's not easy to find mental health solutions on the internet. Spend less time searching and more time working on your mental well being by trying out apps, podcasts, newsletters on breakthru.
nodes.title: breakthru - Curated apps & resources for your mental health

nodes.excerpt: Over 20% of females struggle with a hormone-related issue such as PCOS, endometriosis, or amenorrhea. Pollie is your friend at every step of your hormonal health journey, from finding your best-fit specialist to symptom tracking.

nodes.excerpt: Our online eye exam makes it easy to get eye care from your couch. Visit our online eye clinic to quickly renew your glasses +/- contact lens prescriptions ($30,) or chat with a licensed eye doctor ($55)! Try here: https://www.quadranteye.com/ YC W21 Batch
nodes.title: Quadrant Eye - Renew your glasses and contact lens RX from your couch

nodes.excerpt: 100% of your meals show up via delivery service. They perfectly meet your macro and calorie targets. Rank your performance, hunger, and enjoyment and the service gets smarter. Save at least 3.5 hours per week. For most people, it saves 5+ hours per week.
